name: electric scooter production, without battery | electric scooter, without battery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6038/documentation

This dataset describes the assembly of the electric scooter without battery. It takes as input the two modules  glider and drivetrain. The production efforts and disposal for the components are described in the respective datasets.

The datset takes as input the two modules (glider and drivetrain) which build the vehicle without battery.

The activity ends with the assembly of the scooter without battery and also includes the manual dismantling for the end of life of the used vehicle.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/309:Manufacture of transport equipment n.e.c./3091:Manufacture of motorcycles

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset is based on averages over passenger car technologies spanning from 2000 to 2010 which are  expected to be representative up to 2015.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: No major changes are expected in commercially available scooter models until 2015.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Own assumptions based on currently available models.

exchanges.description: Assembly of the scooter from glider and powertrain.
